name: Build-A-Brawl
description:
Build-A-Brawl is a couch-party style 3D physics-based fighting game in which you create a your own makeshift creature from a variety of parts, each with their own advantages and disadvantages, and beat each other up on a variety of maps, each with different gimmicks.

In order to play you'll need at least 2 players joined to start the game. You can play with one keyboard+mouse and up to 3 controllers- just plug them in to your computer with a USB!

Download the game below and run the .exe file to play!
